net.jodah.failsafe

Class Fallback<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jodah.failsafe.PolicyListeners<S,R>
      • net.jodah.failsafe.FailurePolicy<Fallback<R>,R>
        • net.jodah.failsafe.Fallback<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - result type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Policy<R>

    public class Fallback<R>
extends FailurePolicy<Fallback<R>,R>
    A Policy that handles failures using a fallback function or result.

    Note: Fallback extends FailurePolicy which offers additional configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Fallback<Void> VOID
      A fallback that will return a void result if execution fails.

      • of

        public static <R> Fallback<R> of(CheckedConsumer<ExecutionAttemptedEvent<? extends R>> fallback)
        Returns the fallback to be executed if execution fails. The fallback accepts an ExecutionAttemptedEvent.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if fallback is null

      • of

        public static <R> Fallback<R> of(CheckedFunction<ExecutionAttemptedEvent<? extends R>,? extends R> fallback)
        Returns the fallback to be executed if execution fails. The fallback applies an ExecutionAttemptedEvent.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if fallback is null

      • ofException

        public static <R> Fallback<R> ofException(CheckedFunction<ExecutionAttemptedEvent<? extends R>,? extends Exception> fallback)
        Returns the fallback to be executed if execution fails and allows an alternative exception to be supplied instead. The fallback applies an ExecutionAttemptedEvent and must return an exception.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if fallback is null

      • of

        public static <R> Fallback<R> of(R fallback)
        Returns the fallback result to be returned if execution fails.
